TitleEnglish: Monster Girl: Ultra Monster Anthropomorphic Plan
SummaryEnglish: An ordinary high school girl named Satsuki Hiraga longs to join the heroic Kaiju Girls organization GIRLS. One day, she awakens to mysterious powers, but Satsuki instead finds herself recruited by Commander Black of the villainous organization, Black Stars. What's a Kaiju Girl to do?
Aliases: Kaijuu Girls Kuro: Ultra Kaijuu Gijinka Keikaku
